DOC.brief_summary: The aim study compare radiological behavior block macroporous phosphocalcium bone substitute comparison iliac crest autograft tibial valgus osteotomy .
DOC.brief_title: Autograft Versus Calcium Phosphate Macroporous Bioceramics Bone Substitute Tibial Valgus Osteotomy
DOC.criteria: knee osteoarthritis eligible tibial valgus osteotomy > 18 y.o prior tibial osteotomy history local infection rheumatoid inflammatory arthritis
